keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: American officials said they were still trying to determine whether the taking of the unmanned ship in the South China Sea was a low-level action or a strategic order.

headline.main: U.S. Demands Return of Drone Seized by Chinese Warship
headline.print_headline: U.S. Demands  Return of Drone  Seized by China
